should_auto_respawn.label: Should Auto Respawn
should_auto_respawn.tooltip: Enable or disable auto respawning to your home town. If you have enabled accept raises and you receive a raise from another player, you will not auto respawn.

auto_respawn_delay.label: Auto Respawn Delay
auto_respawn_delay.tooltip: Set the delay (seconds) before auto respawning.

should_accept_raises.label: Should Accept Raises
should_accept_raises.tooltip: Enable or disable automatic acceptance of raises from other players.

accept_raise_delay.label: Accept Raise Delay
accept_raise_delay.tooltip: Set the delay (seconds) before accepting a raise from another player.
